Nunca compartiremos tu email con tercero: We'll never share your email with anyone else
Lo sentimos, parece que ha habido un err: We are sorry, it seems that there was an error. Page not found!
¡Las contraseñas introducidas tienen que: Entered passwords must be the same!
Tus datos se han actualizado correctamen: Your information has been updated successfully!
Parece que ha habido un error, inténtalo: It seems there's been a problem. Try again.
Contraseña actual incorrecta. Tienes que: Incorrect actual password. You must enter your actual password correctly to confirm the update!
Ponle otro nombre al archivo e inténtalo: Rename the file and try again.
El nombre del archivo subido debe tener: The name of the uploaded file must have between 1 and 35 characters. Try again.
No se puede dejar el campo vacio, vuelve: You can't leave the field empty, try again.
¡No has subido ningún archivo todavía!: You haven't uploaded any files yet!
Ha ocurrido un error al aceptar al usuar: An error has occurred when accepting new user, please try again later.
Ha ocurrido un error al rechazar al usua: An error has occurred when rejecting new user, please try again later.
